author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify several test scripts in Geometry/HGCalCommonData to test geometry versions beyond the first V17

#### PR validation:

Use the test scripts on the existing codes

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx341H Modify several test scripts in Geometry/HGCalCommonData to test geometry versions beyond the first V17
